meanings.definition: A slight or indirect indication or suggestion.
meanings.sent1: She gave him a hint about the surprise party.
meanings.sent2: He found a hint in the old letter that led him to the hidden treasure.
meanings.sent3: The hint she left was so subtle that no one noticed it at first.
meanings.sent4: His smile was a hint of the joy he felt inside.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious note contained a hint about the secret code.

meanings.definition: A small piece of information that helps solve a problem or mystery.
meanings.sent1: The detective found a hint that cracked the case wide open.
meanings.sent2: The map provided a hint to the location of the missing key.
meanings.sent3: The hint in the crossword puzzle made him chuckle as he solved it.
meanings.sent4: Her intuition was a hint that guided her through the maze of choices.
meanings.sent5: The fingerprint was a crucial hint in identifying the suspect.

meanings.sent1: She tried to hint at her preference without directly saying it.
meanings.sent2: He hinted at the surprise party without giving it away.
meanings.sent3: The cat hinted at wanting more treats by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: His eyes hinted at the sadness he was trying to hide.
meanings.sent5: The dark clouds hinted at an approaching storm.
